channel.title: nxEvolution | 718 | Great Bosses | Perfect Switching | Join Today
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img5/2314/a3n.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][I]WEBSITE IS A WORK IN PROGRESS[/I][/SIZE]
[img]http://png.findicons.com/files/icons/1581/silk/16/controller.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.nxevolution.net"]Website[/URL] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.nxboards.net"]Forums[/URL] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/ICONS/play.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?19hxot8jx8cigxn"]Download[/URL]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Georgie][I][B]nxEvolution[/B] is a Runescape Private Server that inspires a variety of people to play due to the daily updates, exciting content and a friendly staff team. Players of all different ages and backgrounds have the opportunity to fit in nicely with the community and help [B]nxEvolution[/B] reach the very top.
Our aim is to achieve, not the biggest community, but the best community for a private server. We cannot do this without picking the finest staff first. Our staff may not be extremely active at this point in time, but once we start to build our wonderful community up, they will be more than happy to come entertain everyone during gameplay.
Good items such as Bandos, Armadyl, Dragon, etc. will be dropped by npcs. All rares will be received only during certain occasions (Holiday events, drop parties, etc.). When you receive a rare, you are allowed to sell it for whatever price, to whomever you want. Any duped rares that are found, will be deleted, and the dupee (Person who duped) will be punished by perm ban / IP ban.[/I][/FONT][/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9zXY8gh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5QR9OYz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6qs0NvJ.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/7957/yt32.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rD3wKln.png[/img] [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/2707/1cu3.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bHaEbOT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dHB9vxO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dE9SYzi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VoSeFHe.png[/img] [img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/7524/ts6e.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Sya4zwl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7XvjlRD.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hnYpljD.png[/img][img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/1446/e7o.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:5, topic:524065”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=642612.msg4328124#msg4328124 date=1373298090]
If I quit Paladious cause they went up on revisions what makes you think I would play this lol… -.- please don’t pm this type of stuff.
[/quote]
stop being mean :c[/quote]I wasn’t being mean. A person who plays this server(staff on it? ) messaged me on mopar about this server and linked me to it. I was just letting them know that I am not interested whatsoever. ( I was former staff on paladious )

Read full topic

[SIZE=3][FONT=Georgie][I]nxEvolution is a Runescape Private Server that inspires a variety of people to play due to the daily updates,
exciting content and a friendly staff team. Players of all different ages and backgrounds have the opportunity to fit in nicely with the community
and help nxEvolution reach the very top.

Our aim is to achieve, not the biggest community, but the best community for a private server. We cannot do this without picking the finest

Good items such as Bandos, Armadyl, Dragon, etc. will be dropped by npcs. All rares will be received only during certain occasions (Holiday events,
